tool_description: Deferred revenue is an amount that was received by a company in advance of earning it. The amount unearned (and therefore deferred) as of the date of the financial statements should be reported as a liability. The title of the liability account might be Unearned Revenues or Deferred Revenues.
name: BrewClub Deferred Revenue
title: BrewClub Deferred Revenue

api_list.name: Deferred revenue.
api_list.description: Returns a revenue schedule of deferred revenue items.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brewclub.p.rapidapi.com/deferredrevenue"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brewclub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://brewclub.p.rapidapi.com/deferredrevenue"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brewclub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
